channel.title: Posts on sawada_ta
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on sawada_ta

item.description: 高見千歌 // canvasを作ってHTMLに突っ込む。 const canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); const context1 = canvas.getContext('2d'); canvas.width = 500; canvas.height = 500; document.body.appendChild(canvas); /* 高見千歌 ここから */ context1.fillStyle = '#fd7e14'; context1.strokeStyle = '#fd7e14'; context1.beginPath(); context1.arc(250, 250, 150, 0, (Math.PI*2), false); context1.stroke(); context1.fill(); context1.fillStyle = '#fff'; context1.strokeStyle =
